#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

string result( int, int );

int main()
{
    int a, b;
    
    while ( ( cin >> a >> b ) && a && b )
    {
        cout << result( a, b ) << endl; 
    }
}

string result( int a, int b )
{
    static const string op = " carry operation";
    
    int count = 0, carry = 0;
    while ( a & b )
    {
    	int sum = ( a % 10 ) + ( b % 10 ) + carry;
    	carry = sum / 10;
    	a /= 10, b /= 10;
    	if ( carry ) ++ count;    
    }
    
    while ( a )
    {
        int sum = ( a % 10 )  + carry;
        carry = sum / 10;
        a /= 10;
        if ( carry ) ++ count;
         
    }
    while ( b )
    {
        int sum = ( b % 10 ) + carry;
        carry = sum / 10;
        b /= 10;
        
        if ( carry ) ++ count;
    }
    string res;
    
    res = ( count ? to_string(count) : "No" );
    res += op;
    
    res += ( ( count > 1 ) ? "s." : "." );
    
    return res;
}
